title: Okay, Riot. Where's my PROJECT theme?

replies.body:
Both PROJECT: YI and PROJECT: OVERDRIVE soundtracks are now up on Soundcloud. :)
https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-yi
https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-overdrive
Are you gonna put it on your spotify too? I want to add it to my playlist already :)

Yes, I saw that. Thank you!

P.S. Great job, on OVERDRIVE, love it!
They said they will take a while...
I didn't hear anything about the release of the theme. Did one of the Music team rioters make a post?
I haven't been able to access the store all night. Lucky you.

I got in shortly after it started before word had spread too far. snagged my PROJECT Fiora. it was slow though, and I'm pretty sure it was bugged or something. Hence why the store is down.

But this is no time for that, I want that PROJECT song from the video.
